summary: This is an email chain between an Assistant United States Attorney and an FBI Special Agent regarding the collection of physical evidence (boots) for the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The boots were purchased for a victim by Jeffrey Epstein and Maxwell in New Mexico, and arrangements are being made for an FBI agent in Austin, Texas, to collect them.

persons.name: Special Agent- FBI New York Field Office Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk
persons.context: Recipient of an email from an AUSA regarding the coordination of evidence collection (boots) for the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Author of the email initiating the request for an FBI agent in Austin, TX, to collect boots as evidence in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as having purchased boots, along with Ghislaine Maxwell, for a victim in New Mexico. The boots are now evidence.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case. Mentioned as having purchased boots, along with Jeffrey Epstein, for a victim. The boots are evidence in her case.

connections.description: Jointly purchased boots for a victim in New Mexico, as stated in the evidence collection request.

connections.person1: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.person2: Special Agent- FBI New York Field Office Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk
connections.description: Corresponding to coordinate the collection and logging of physical evidence (boots) for the Maxwell prosecution.

events.title: Email Coordination for Evidence Collection
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails an FBI Special Agent to arrange for an FBI agent in Austin, TX, to collect boots (evidence purchased by Epstein and Maxwell for a victim) and send them to New York for the Maxwell case.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
Special Agent- FBI New York Field Office Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A victim, through counsel, agreed to provide boots purchased for her by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell in New Mexico as evidence in the Maxwell case.
The prosecution requested an FBI agent in Austin, Texas, to collect the boots from the victim's house, log them as evidence, and send them to New York.
Both the prosecution and the defense intended to examine the boots once they were received in New York.
The email demonstrates ongoing investigative coordination between the U.S. Attorney's Office and the FBI in 2021 for the Maxwell prosecution.
